sourcesContent:
import React ,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import Header from '../../Extras/Header' import Admin_sidebar from '../../Extras/Admin_sidebar' import Axios from 'axios' function Admin_Organizations() { const [orgname,Setorgname] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/orginfo").then((response)=>{ Setorgname(response.data) }) },[]) return ( <>
{orgname.map((val)=>( ))}
Organization ID Organization Name Organization type Organization Status Relief Programs
{val.org_id} {val.org_name} {val.org_category_id} {val.org_status} UNDER CONSTRUCTION
) } export default Admin_Organizations
